Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires cable television companies to issue credits for service outages
Summary: Requires cable television companies to issue credits for service outages to all affected subscribers.
LawCode: Add ยง224-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring cable television companies to issue credits for service outages
